thread.title: Securities Attorney Laura Anthony Talks LawCast and the Future of the Securities Law Network
thread.title_full: Securities Attorney Laura Anthony Talks LawCast and the Future of the Securities Law Network - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Securities Attorney Laura Anthony Talks LawCast and the Future of the Securities Law Network
text:
Legal & Compliance, LLC
WEST PALM BEACH, Florida , October 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
It's been one year and 50 episodes since the launch of LawCast.com , the securities law network, and securities attorney Laura Anthony couldn't be more pleased. The site has become an established news and information resource for professionals in the OTC and small-cap markets, but attorney Anthony is planning to turn LawCast into so much more.
Securities attorney Laura Anthony is the founder of Legal & Compliance, LLC , a traditional bricks-and-mortar corporate and securities law firm with a strong internet presence. She is also the creator of SecuritiesLawBlog.com and the producer and host of LawCast.
While many would be satisfied with those credentials, attorney Anthony is just getting started.
"We possess a vision for LawCast that encompasses every aspect of law and plan to create a wide-reaching news platform that features many great legal minds," attorney Anthony said. "LawCast currently provides the OTC and small-cap community with a new episode each week. Topics range from FINRA compliance, taking private companies public, SEC rules and regulations and just about every other subject our viewership can benefit from. LawCast has been received far better than we ever anticipated. Over the next two years, we intend to diversify LawCast into numerous practice areas of law, such as civil and criminal litigation, intellectual property law, tax law, and basically every other legal specialty in existence."
In its current form, LawCast features news segments with a runtime of five to eight minutes. One particular segment, " E*Trade Capital Markets Violation ," aired on November 6, 2014 and went viral. To date, it is one of the most popular LawCast episodes.
"I watched the E*Trade installment of LawCast and thought it was great," said Lenny Sokolow , securities industry veteran. "I was already familiar with the E*Trade story, but this was the first time it was summed up so succinctly."
Legal & Compliance, LLC focuses on going public transactions, complex corporate transactions and ongoing legal support for both private and public companies. The firm has grown rapidly since its inception in 2001.
Securities attorney Laura Anthony and her experienced legal team provide ongoing corporate counsel to small and mid-size OTC issuers as well as private companies going public on the over-the-counter market, such as the OTCBB, OTCQB and OTCQX. Legal & Compliance, LLC is a comprehensive corporate, securities and business transactions law firm assisting clients in all aspects of commerce, including initial public offerings, reverse mergers, registered public offerings, exempt private offerings, all forms of complex corporate finance transactions, compliance with the over-the-counter market trading platforms such as OTCQB, compliance with FINRA and DTC, strategic planning for unique management and ownership issues, and broad-scope legal services. Laura Anthony, Esq. , is also the creator and author of SecuritiesLawBlog.com and the host of LawCast.com , The Securities Law Network.
